messages.content: What is the latest version of Python?

{"query": "latest version of Python", "top_k": [{"url": "https://www.liquidweb.com/blog/latest-python-version/", "title": "The latest Python version: Python 3.14 - Liquid Web", "content": "The latest major version, Python 3.14 was officially released on October 7, 2025. delta.content: The latest version of Python is Python 3.14, which was officially released on October 7, 2025. This version includes a mix of changes to the language, implementation, and standard library, as described in the official documentation. You can download the latest version from the official Python website: https://www.python.org/downloads/.
